org.drip.spaces.metric

Interface R1Normed

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GeneralizedMetricVectorSpace, GeneralizedVector, R1GeneralizedVector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R1Combinatorial, R1CombinatorialBall, R1Continuous, R1ContinuousBall

    public interface R1Normed
extends GeneralizedMetricVectorSpace, R1GeneralizedVector
    R1Normed Abstract Class implements the Normed, Bounded/Unbounded Continuous/Combinatorial l^p R^1 Spaces. The Reference we've used is: - Carl, B., and I. Stephani (1990): Entropy, Compactness, and Approximation of Operators, Cambridge University Press, Cambridge UK.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
